originalText.text:
I am incredibly pleased with the professionalism and knowledge of Vincent, He always is highly efficient, hard-working, thoughtful, kind, personable,and on time. Alway’s listens to our needs concerns and takes care of any pest problems. He repeatedly performs outstanding service. Vincent is a great employee of Ecowise Pest Control and needs to be recognized
for his outstanding service. Thank you.

originalText.text: We had tried numerous exterminators and poisons ourselves and the problem was only getting worse. Within one day after Vincent worked on our home we saw amazing results!

text.text: We had tried numerous exterminators and poisons ourselves and the problem was only getting worse. Within one day after Vincent worked on our home we saw amazing results!

originalText.text: On 2 separate occasions I have used Ecowise Pest Control to eradicate pests from my apartment.  Vinny and his team are bed bug specialists and are always ready for the challenge.  He ended my bedbug infestation in my Brooklyn apartment, and they never came back. This was a stressful situation, and Vinny and his team put my mind at ease, and took care of the issue right the first time, so I could get back to sleeping at night. The second instance is when I had bird mites in my apartment. This was one of the most stressful experiences in my life.  These mites invaded my apartment and most of my expensive DJ and computer equipment. They were everywhere from the coffee maker to my DJ mixer and laptop. Vinny and his team used specialized treatments meant be safely applied to electronic devices, getting rid of the mites, without causing damage to my valuable electronics. I couldn’t thank Ecowise enough for saving my equipment and making my apartment livable again. If you really want to end your pest problems. I highly recommend Vinny and his team at Ecowise Pest Control. Definitely the best out here….hands down!

originalText.text:
If you are a business and looking for a professional company to work with Ecowise is NOT the right company for you.
The first I spoke to a nice man who recommended to meet at my store in order to understand what I needed and get a quote so went ahead and scheduled a time but instead nobody showed up at the appointment and I received a lame text (40min before the meeting!!) stating if I wanted to start I will have to agree to a $475 fee and call back on Monday?? I texted back multiple times and call back the number (Vincent) but no answer.. A week after still no reply..

originalText.text: I contacted Ecowise Pest Control NYC To come check out my basement for possible rodents. A nice gentleman came over and confirm that it was in fact mice.They gave me a great price for their services and were also very professional, knowledgeable and helpful. I highly recommend Ecowise Pest Control NYC to anyone with pest issues.
